price: Èyí ni ìmọ̀ àmọ̀dájú àti ẹ̀rí fún àwọn ènìyàn. Ìmọ̀nà àti ìkẹ́ ni fún ìjọ tó ní àmọ̀dájú.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: hādhā baṣāiru lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmin yūqinūna
